mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_review (num, writer, title, imagePath, regdate, viewCount, rating, reservetype) VALUES(board_review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{imagePath}, SYSDATE, #{viewCount}, #{rating}, #{reservetype})
mapper.select:
SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, imagePath, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate, viewCount, rating, reservetype, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM board_review ORDER BY num DESC
) result1 WHERE num = #{num}
